commandDescription: Load records from CSV files to Salesforce org, resolving relationships between records
inputDirFlagDescription: directory which includes input data files in CSV
targetObjectsFlagDescription: list of object names to include in loading
ignoreObjectsFlagDescription: list of object names to exclude from loading
mappingObjectsFlagDescription: list of object and key field name pair to map to existing records (e.g. User:Email,RecordType:DeveloperName
ignoreFieldsFlagDescription: list of object.field path to exclude from loading (e.g. Account.OwnerId,OpportunityLineItem.TotalPrice)
defaultNamespaceFlagDescription: developer namespace prefix for managed packages
deleteBeforeLoadFlagDescription: delete all records in target objects before loading
